FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our plans

No contract means you're not locked into any long-term agreement. You pay month-to-month and can cancel, pause, or change your plan at any time without paying early termination fees or penalties.

Yes! With Vouch Mobile, you can cancel your service at any time with zero termination fees. Your service continues until the end of your paid period, and you can even keep your phone number if you're switching to another carrier.

You can pause your Vouch Mobile service for up to 3 months through the app. During the pause, you won't be charged, and your number will be reserved. Simply unpause when you're ready to resume service.

Absolutely! You get the exact same AT&T network coverage, 5G speeds, and features whether you're on a month-to-month plan or if you'd been with us for years. No compromises.

No credit check required! Since there's no contract, we don't need to check your credit. Everyone gets approved instantly regardless of credit history.

Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time through the Vouch Mobile app. Changes take effect on your next billing cycle, and there are never any fees to switch plans.
